column1: |产品名称|产品型号|功能描述|

|H0FL Compact Converter Rack|H0FL-H0B/H0FL-2P/H0FL-5P|支持 1/2/5 接口转换器卡和 1/2/5 个远程接口转换器的服务方向；支持多种服务卡，如以太网接入、协议转换器、媒体转换器等；所有服务支持远程管理，大大减少了用户端的管理工作量；丰富的 LED 指示灯用于网络链接和工作状态；各种服务接口符合相应的国际标准和建议；采用 1U 高机箱，节省设备空间；高度集成，即插即用，热插拔，可靠性高，资本支出和运营成本低|

column2: H0FL-H0B: up to 1 service card  H0FL-2P: up to 2 service cards  H0FL-5P: up to 5 service cards
column3: H0FL-H0B: up to 1 service card  H0FL-2P: up to 2 service cards  H0FL-5P: up to 5 service cards
10/100/1000 Base-Tx half/full duplex auto-negotiation mode and manual mode (1000M full-duplex, 100M/10M half/full duplex), HP auto-MDIX
BNC, CC4, RJ-48C or dual-E1 socket
DCE main oscillator clock, DCE E1 line clock or DTE V.35 interface clock
RJ-45, using SNMP, 10Base-T Ethernet MDI port
Baud rate: 9600; Data bit: 8; Stop bit: 1; No parity bit; 9-pin D-type socket

column2: H0FL-H0B:  205mm×35mm×160mm  H0FL-2P/5P:  440mm×44mm×265mm (without mounting ears)  482mm×44mm×265mm (with mounting ears)
column3: H0FL-H0B:  205mm×35mm×160mm  H0FL-2P/5P:  440mm×44mm×265mm (without mounting ears)  482mm×44mm×265mm (with mounting ears)
